name: Village Website
description: Developed a comprehensive website for a local village community, providing information on local events.

name: Telegram Bot for Class Timetable
description: Created a Telegram bot that delivers class timetables upon user request. The bot streamlined the process for students, enhancing accessibility to class schedules through a messaging platform.

name: UX-UI Design for Waste Management App
description: Led the UX/UI design for a waste management mobile application, focusing on user experience.
